choose.when: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(p.RSVT_YMD, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CSL_DATE, p.STUD_NO, p.ATND_YN AS CSL_STATUS, g.GC_OG_NM AS CSL_CATEGORY FROM PRGRM_APP p JOIN GC_PROGRAM g ON p.PRGRM_CD = g.PRGRM_CD WHERE stud_no = #{userNo}
choose.otherwise: SELECT p.RSVT_YMD AS CSL_DATE, p.STUD_NO, p.ATND_YN AS CSL_STATUS, g.GC_OG_NM AS CSL_CATEGORY FROM PRGRM_APP p JOIN GC_PROGRAM g ON p.PRGRM_CD = g.PRGRM_CD WHERE stud_no = #{userNo}

mapper.select: SELECT s.STUD_NO, s.REAL_STUD_NO, s.C_CD, s.GEN_CD, s.STUD_NM, s.REAL_STUD_NO, s.BIRTHDAY, s.ST, s.MBR_TELNO, u.USER_NO, u.email FROM STUD_INFO s JOIN USERS u ON u.USER_NO = s.STUD_NO WHERE s.STUD_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM USERS s WHERE s.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND s.pw = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET pw = SHA2(#{password}, 256) WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
